MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL52 postcode area of Criccieth, affecting properties in Rhoslan and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.26am.  In order to complete repairs to a faulty overhead equipment , engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.12am on Jan 30, 2021.
